name: Pumpkin Hunt (danielwiktorczyk)
description:
Out for the nightly Pumpkin Hunt once again! 

Aim for a Highscore by shooting down Pumpkins, Ghosts, and Witches. 

Beware! Make sure to get at least 10 targets before the night is over to continue the hunt the next night

Enter a Frenzy State with TAB, but beware: more fiends will appear! 

A short game I made for my Game Development University Class

Play in fullscreen for the full experience!
